<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Delete a node with the given node id.
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/graph/{graph_id}/node/{node_id}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

**Experimental**: This API is not stable and might be subject of change.<br/> Delete a node with the given node id.

## Request

>

      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"graph_id","in":"path","description":"The identifier of the graph","example":"resoto","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"node_id","in":"path","description":"The identifier of the node","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
